long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab2Mark lets users save and manage a list of web page links with custom names and export and copy all the saved links as markdown files. Easily organize a list of links and paste them into your favorite markdown editor like Notion, Obsidian, IaWriter, etc. It's designed for researchers, students, and anyone who needs to keep track of web resources and thoughts about them. No more back and forth between your browser and your editor.
